overview: Whiskey smuggler Dubec, trades liquor to the Indians, takes revenge on the Royal North West Mounted Police pursuing him by killing the wife of post commander Sergeant Delisle and abducting his teen-aged daughter Nonette.
tagline: Some fight in this Picture! Some fight is putting it mildly. It is one of the biggest, most amazing fights you ever saw on the screen.
title: The Devil's Trail
